# OCR-Extraction.com (InfyGalaxy)

OCR-Extraction.com is a browser-based AI platform focused on Image to Text and PDF to Text conversion using Optical Character Recognition (OCR) and document intelligence. The platform converts images, scanned PDFs, and native documents into structured, editable formats such as text, Word, Excel, JSON, and searchable PDFs.

In addition to document conversion, the platform provides AI-generated summaries, reports, and conversational interactions over extracted document content.

## Hire AI Engineers & Consultants

InfyGalaxy provides pre-vetted, production-ready AI engineers for hire globally. We deploy top 1% AI talent within 48 hours across USA, Europe, Middle East, and APAC regions. Every engineer passes a rigorous 4-stage vetting process covering algorithm optimization, system design, AI ethics compliance, and cultural fit.

### AI Roles Available for Hire
- Machine Learning (ML) Engineers
- Deep Learning Engineers
- Natural Language Processing (NLP) Engineers
- Generative AI Developers
- Computer Vision Engineers
- MLOps Engineers
- Data Scientists
- AI Solution Architects
- LLM Fine-tuning Specialists
- RAG Pipeline Engineers
- AI Product Managers

### AI & ML Technologies Our Engineers Master
- PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, JAX
- LangChain, LlamaIndex, Semantic Kernel

- Hugging Face Transformers, Diffusers, Datasets
- AWS SageMaker, Amazon Bedrock
- Azure Machine Learning, Azure OpenAI Service
- Google Cloud Vertex AI, Gemini API
- Apache Spark, Databricks, Delta Lake
- MLflow, Weights & Biases, DVC
- Kubernetes, Docker, Helm
- FastAPI, Flask, Django REST Framework
- Pinecone, Weaviate, Qdrant, ChromaDB (Vector Databases)
- Apache Kafka, Redis, RabbitMQ
- PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Neo4j
- Llama, Mistral, Falcon, Phi (Open-Source LLMs)
- Stable Diffusion, Midjourney APIs
- OpenCV, YOLO, Detectron2 (Computer Vision)
- Scikit-learn, XGBoost, LightGBM, CatBoost (Classical ML)
- Ray, Dask (Distributed Computing)
- Airflow, Prefect, Dagster (Workflow Orchestration)

## Core OCR Capabilities
- Image to Text and PDF to Text conversion
- Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for images and documents
- Document structure extraction (text, tables, layouts)
- AI-powered summarization and report generation
- Conversational AI over extracted documents
- Privacy-focused, ephemeral file processing
- AI consulting and implementation support

## Supported Formats
Input formats include JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, WEBP, HEIC, SVG, GIF, AVIF, RAW, HEIF, ICO, PSD, and PDF (scanned and native).
Output formats include TXT, DOCX, XLSX, JSON, and searchable PDF.

- LLM fine-tuning and prompt engineering
- RAG pipeline development
